VAMPS SeaBase Portal

A Multispecies Transcriptomic Resource and Platform for Gene Network Inference.

Taxa

VAMPS SeaBase Portal currently contains data for 4 species.

BLAST

Blast the 5 available genomes via Sequence Server.

Browse

Visualize genomes and their annotations (7) via jBrowse.
